name: Japan
interesting_fact: Japan is made up of over 6,800 islands.

name: Brazil
interesting_fact: Brazil is home to about 60% of the Amazon Rainforest.

name: Canada
interesting_fact: Canada has the longest coastline in the world.

name: Egypt
interesting_fact: The Great Pyramid of Giza is the oldest of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.

name: Australia
interesting_fact: Australia is home to more kangaroos than people.

name: India
interesting_fact: India is the world's largest democracy.

name: France
interesting_fact: France is the most visited country in the world.

name: Norway
interesting_fact: Norway has more electric cars per capita than any other country.

name: South Africa
interesting_fact: South Africa has three capital cities.

name: Nepal
interesting_fact: Nepal is home to Mount Everest, the highest point on Earth.
